name: GoodGuy/BadGuy
description:
GoodGuy / BadGuy is a game made for the "No TouchScreen GameJam" which lasted from September 8th 2016 to September 20th 2016. We had a lot of fun making it and we hope you enjoy it!

Instructions

The game uses your phone accelerometer. Grab your phone with its screen facing upwards (sort of like to the roof above you). Tilt up to turn left, down to turn right. Tilt left to brake.

GoodGuy Mode: don't hit the animals and travel as far as you can! Keep an eye on your fuel level and also in the road, there might be some fuel there!

BadGuy Mode: hit as many animals as you can and travel as far as possible! Keep an eye on your fuel level and also in the road, there might be some fuel there!

Made by Enrique Boesche and Sebastian Arriola, UNI university students from Guatemala.
